org.midica.ui.player

Class RefresherThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.midica.ui.player.RefresherThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RefresherThread
extends java.lang.Thread

    The thread defined by this class is responsible to for refreshing the progress bar while a midi stream is being played.

    Author:
    Jan Trukenm√ºller

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void die()
      Sets a flag to make the run() method stop running.
      void run()

    • Constructor Detail

      • RefresherThread

        public RefresherThread(PlayerController controller)

        Creates the refresher thread when the player window is opened.

        Parameters:
        controller - Event listener object for the player window.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()

        Refreshes the player window’s progress bar in an endless loop every 50 milliseconds.

        Stops refreshing if die() is called.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • die

        public void die()

        Sets a flag to make the run() method stop running.
